segments.pli: Saṃyutta Nikāya 35
segments.en: Linked Discourses 35

segments.pli: 7. Migajālavagga
segments.en: 7. With Migajāla

segments.pli: 65. Paṭhamasamiddhimārapañhāsutta
segments.en: 65. Samiddhi’s Question About Māra

segments.pli: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
segments.en: At one time the Buddha was staying near Rājagaha, in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrels’ feeding ground.

segments.pli: Atha kho āyasmā samiddhi yena bhagavā … pe …
segments.en: Then Venerable Samiddhi went up to the Buddha …

segments.pli: bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: and said to him:

segments.pli: “‘māro, māro’ti, bhante, vuccati.
segments.en: “Sir, they speak of this thing called ‘Māra’.

segments.pli: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, māro vā assa mārapaññatti vā”ti?
segments.en: How do we define Māra or what is known as Māra?”

segments.pli: “Yattha kho, samiddhi, atthi cakkhu, atthi rūpā, atthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, atthi cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, atthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā.
segments.en: “Samiddhi, where there is the eye, sights, eye consciousness, and phenomena to be known by eye consciousness, there is Māra or what is known as Māra.

segments.pli: Atthi sotaṃ, atthi saddā, atthi sotaviññāṇaṃ, atthi sotaviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, atthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā.
segments.en: Where there is the ear, sounds, ear consciousness, and phenomena to be known by ear consciousness, there is Māra or what is known as Māra.

segments.pli: Atthi ghānaṃ, atthi gandhā, atthi ghānaviññāṇaṃ, atthi ghānaviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, atthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā.
segments.en: Where there is the nose, smells, nose consciousness, and phenomena to be known by nose consciousness, there is Māra or what is known as Māra.

segments.pli: Atthi jivhā, atthi rasā, atthi jivhāviññāṇaṃ, atthi jivhāviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, atthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā.
segments.en: Where there is the tongue, tastes, tongue consciousness, and phenomena to be known by tongue consciousness, there is Māra or what is known as Māra.

segments.pli: Atthi kāyo, atthi phoṭṭhabbā, atthi kāyaviññāṇaṃ, atthi kāyaviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, atthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā.
segments.en: Where there is the body, touches, body consciousness, and phenomena to be known by body consciousness, there is Māra or what is known as Māra.

segments.pli: Atthi mano, atthi dhammā, atthi manoviññāṇaṃ, atthi manoviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, atthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā.
segments.en: Where there is the mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, and phenomena to be known by mind consciousness, there is Māra or what is known as Māra.

segments.pli: Yattha ca kho, samiddhi, natthi cakkhu, natthi rūpā, natthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, natthi cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, natthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā.
segments.en: Where there is no eye, no sights, no eye consciousness, and no phenomena to be known by eye consciousness, there is no Māra or what is known as Māra.

segments.pli: Natthi sotaṃ … pe …
segments.en: Where there is no ear …

segments.pli: natthi ghānaṃ … pe …
segments.en: no nose …

segments.pli: natthi jivhā, natthi rasā, natthi jivhāviññāṇaṃ, natthi jivhāviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, natthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā.
segments.en: no tongue …

segments.pli: Natthi kāyo … pe ….
segments.en: no body …

segments.pli: Natthi mano, natthi dhammā, natthi manoviññāṇaṃ, natthi manoviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, natthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā”ti.
segments.en: Where there is no mind, no thoughts, no mind consciousness, and no phenomena to be known by mind consciousness, there is no Māra or what is known as Māra.”

segments.pli: Tatiyaṃ.

sections.title: At one time the Buddha was staying near Rājagaha,…

suttaplex.blurb: Venerable Samiddhi asks the Buddha what Māra is. The Buddha says that that Māra is present so long as the senses exist.
